        public void pushNotification(IUMPService.UserType userType,
                             java.lang.String[] users,
                             java.lang.String portName,
                             PushNotification pushNotification)
        Description copied from interface: IUMPService
        Process agents use this method to post a notification message to the client. A notification message is different from a response message and is used as an alerting mechanism.
        Specified by:
        pushNotification in interface IUMPService
